text: @realDonaldTrump When you & @VP are in hospital from COVID-19, Pelosi will take over as President. She WILL assemble groups to seriously address COVID-19 and prepare for fall resurgence, remove Barr, Miller, Kushner and bitch Ivanka, and sign executive order to reverse ALL your executive orders.
